Race.SpecificTitle: Sales Tax District No. 1 -- 1% S&U Tax - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Sales Tax District No. 1 Proposition
(Sales Tax Renewal)
(Rural Solid Waste and Roads)
Race.FullText: Shall Sales Tax District No. 1 of the Parish of Beauregard, State of Louisiana (the "District") be authorized to levy and collect for a period of ten (10) years from April 1, 2016, a tax of one percent (1%) (the "Tax") upon the sale at retail, the use, the lease or rental, the consumption, and the storage for use or consumption, of tangible personal property and on sales of services in the District (an estimated $2,800,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), with the proceeds thereof (after paying the expenses of collecting and administering the Tax), to be dedicated as follows (i) in each fiscal year, there shall first be paid or set aside from said proceeds all costs related to collecting and disposing of solid waste in the District; and (ii) thereafter, any proceeds remaining on December 31st of each year may be expended in the ensuing fiscal year equally among the six (6) work zones established under the Police Jury's Road and Bridge Maintenance and Operation Plan, for constructing, improving and maintaining public roads and bridges in the District?
